item.title: Deep Learning Introduction
item.description: Deep Learning DL is a field of ML that is primarily concerned with the learning of representations of data. At the core of DL is the use of MLP, used to model these representations.

item.title: Estimation Theory
item.description: Estimation Theory Orbit Determination and Parameter Estimation Predicting the state ($\bm{x}_t$) of a spacecraft given an initial condition ($\bm{x}_0$), and models which form the equations of motion of the satellite, ($\dot{\bm{x}}=f(t,\bm{x})$), is a straightforward task involving the solution of an initial value problem (IVP) in the form of an ordinary differential equation (ODE).
